welcome:
Welcome to Wikimedia Zulipchat.
If you need any help with GSoD proposals, type `!help gsod`.
If you need any help with GSoC proposals, type `!help gsoc`.
If you need help with Outreachy proposals, type `!help outreachy`.
You can join the #**technical-support** channel to get technical help related to Wikimedia infrastructure.
Type `!help` for a full list of available commands. :blush:
